description: man at center with his genitals exposed being pulled by his blue loincloth by a pregnant woman at left wearing a red skirt with her breasts exposed; cowering young woman in an open green kimono with purple flowers at right; tiny man wearing a green striped kimono with purple trim hiding beneath young woman's kimono in LRC; text at top in a cloud and in six other locations throughout the print
title: Love Revealed (Yarikuri-shima)
